purpose: To provide an advanced solution for complex question answering by enhancing the RAG methodology with graph-based algorithms.
principle: Employs graph-based algorithms to optimize the retrieval and generation processes in RAG, enhancing the accuracy and relevance of answers.
reusability: Offers modular components that can be integrated into existing systems for enhanced question answering capabilities, with support for custom knowledge graphs.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited coverage in non-English languages, and requires setup of a knowledge graph for optimal performance.
name: Controllable-RAG-Agent
description: This repository provides an advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solution for complex question answering. It uses sophisticated graph based algorithm to handle the tasks.
highlight: Advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) solution using sophisticated graph-based algorithms for complex question answering.
